edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.postagger
Interface CanTagOneWord

All Known Implementing Classes:
AffixTagger, DefaultPartOfSpeechRetagger, IRetagger, NoopRetagger, ProperNounRetagger, RegexpTagger, SimpleRuleBasedTagger, SimpleTagger, SuffixTagger, UnigramTagger
public interface CanTagOneWord

Interface for a part of speech tagger which can tag a single word.

          Tag a single adorned word.
